availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and brick mason. Kentucky native. Married to Sydney Linn. Children included Elizabeth, Reuben, Wittemam O., John R., and George O. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Brick mason in Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 473.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 114.
Find A Grave, "Young A. Linn (1834-1890)," Memorial #21288681, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21288681 (accessed September 19, 2018).
